story.title: The Children - Episode 2
story.storyDescription: Someone throws a brick through Kiera's window. On the attached note, it says: GIVE BACK OUR CHILDREN.
story.creator: web-uploader

messages.text: Hey, Doug? Do you know where Calvin is?
Why are you texting me?
Because youâ€™re my husbandâ€™s brother and Iâ€™m worried about him.
He sent me some reallyâ€¦weird textsâ€¦
I donâ€™t know where he is.
Oh. No idea at all?
You know that Calvin hasnâ€™t talked to me in weeks, right?
What?!
Not a word.
Thatâ€™s impossible. You work together. Youâ€™re so closeâ€”
I feel like any time I see him, heâ€™s texting you.
I donâ€™t know who heâ€™s texting, but it isnâ€™t me.
Are you sure you didnâ€™t forget?
Maybe there was a miscommunication or something?
Why are you so hell bent on this?
Itâ€™s kind of a long story, butâ€¦
Iâ€™m worried about him.
And I just want to know where he is.
Look, I donâ€™t have anything against youâ€¦
But I donâ€™t want anything to do with Calvin anymore.
Wait, what?
Calvinâ€™s no longer my brother.
Why would you say something like that?
Heâ€™s dead to meâ€”
Dead to our whole family.
And after what he did, he should be dead to you too.
What did he do?
Doug, Iâ€™m freaking out. There are news vans everywhereâ€”
Someone even broke the window.
Keira sends picture of the brick that reads GIVE BACK OUR CHILDREN.
What did he do?
You donâ€™t know?
He sent me weird texts. He told me to go to the basement.
Said someone would get me down there, but then his phone disconnected.
Oh my Godâ€¦you need to give your phone to the police.
Please tell me whatâ€™s going on. Iâ€™m so confused.
I guess itâ€™s better you know sooner rather than later.
Brace yourself and turn on the TV.
Make sure youâ€™re sitting.
He told me not to turn on the TV.
Forget what Calvin said. Justâ€¦turn it on.
And for what itâ€™s worthâ€¦Iâ€™m so, so sorry.
Keira turns on the TV. Thereâ€™s an image of her house surrounded by news vans and mobs of people.
At the bottom, the headline saysâ€¦
PEDIATRICIAN WANTED FOR THE KIDNAPPING OF SEVERAL CHILDREN.
In the top corner is a picture of Calvin, and beneath it is his name/title: CALVIN PIPER, MD.
Thereâ€™s been a mistakeâ€”
This isnâ€™t something Calvin would do.
Keira, he did it.
I donâ€™t believe it. Do you really think heâ€™s capable of something like this?
Youâ€™re his brother. You work with himâ€”
So youâ€™ve seen how many underprivileged children he helps for free.
And what about the massively high ratings as a pediatrician?
Heâ€™s the best in the state. Heâ€™s not a predator. Heâ€™s NOT.
He told you he screwed something up, didnâ€™t he?
Yeah â€” but making a mistake doesnâ€™t mean heâ€™s a monster.
I know him â€” and this isnâ€™t him.
Can you truthfully say you believe he did something like this?
Itâ€™sâ€¦out of character for him.
And youâ€™re right. The charges against him donâ€™t fit the guy Iâ€™ve known since I was in diapers.
He was framed.
By who?
I donâ€™t want to be a downer, but think about the cases youâ€™ve seen in news over the years.
All the kidnappings in the past.
You know how they interview the neighbors and everyone says they had no idea?
No one ever suspects a psychopath.
Especially people close to the abuser.
So thatâ€™s it? You just believe the news instead of your own brother?
Considering how weird heâ€™s been acting, yeah.
Itâ€™s not him.
I trust him â€” so Iâ€™m going to the basement workroom like Calvin said.
Someoneâ€™s going to pick me up, and then Iâ€™ll be able to get some answers.
Donâ€™t you dare.
The police are probably on their way and theyâ€™ll have a search warrant.
If you follow his orders, youâ€™ll be an accessory.
Not happening. Because Calvin didnâ€™t do anything wrong.
He told me he made a mistake. It canâ€™t be this.
Keira, this is a terrible idea. No one is coming to get you.
It doesnâ€™t make sense. How could anyone get inside anyway?
Your house is surrounded. Thereâ€™s no way in.
Keira sighs. Doug has a point.
How WOULD anyone be able to get in when the home is surrounded?
But before Keira can reply, a text pops up.
Honey, are you down in the workroom yet?
Wait â€” how are you going to get in?
Keira, we donâ€™t have much timeâ€”
Please. Iâ€™ll tell you as soon as youâ€™re here.
Right. On my way.
Be fast. Love you.
I love you, too.
Keira returns to texting Doug.
Calvin texted me. I have to go.
Wait for the police. Please.
Before Keira can reply, she hears another crashâ€”
The sound of breaking glass. Sheâ€™s in danger.
People are trying to get inside.
I have no choice â€” I need to go.
Keira, donâ€™t! Please!
Keira goes to the cupboard where they have kept emergency water jugs and canned food in case of natural disaster.
Everythingâ€™s missing except for one bottle of water.
The hair rises on the back of her neck.
The emergency supplies are gone.
What?
Keira sends a picture of the empty cupboard.
Iâ€™ve only got one jug of water.
Shit. Donâ€™t moveâ€”
Iâ€™m driving over there. Iâ€™ll come for you. Donâ€™t move.
I have to! People are trying to get in!
A text pops up from Restricted again.
Youâ€™re in danger.
You need to get to the workroom.
NOW!
